phrases: I want you to study the sheet music over and over,

Take a good look at it!

When does he get to play?

He really is just like a machine.

So tell me, did that calm you down?
What is the big idea, all of a sudden?

That is why you are imprisoned inside that cage of music scores.
Do not worry, I know you can do it.

Go on a journey, he is saying.

please get ready to go on.

I cannot set my chair just right.
So that kid's Kousei Arima, huh?

Actually, why is he accompanying her?
What kind of performance do you have planned?
Elohim, Essaim... Elohim, Essaim... I implore you...
A song dedicated to the virtuoso violinist, Sarasate.
All right, that was a good start.
I can hear the notes, too.
I am glad we are doing this song.

but if I listen closely to the violin, and keep an eye on the sheet music...
Technically, it is not a difficult song.
Ah... Kousei's playing the piano again...
In a complete departure from her previous performance,

And now she is showing her true colors!
The sound is out of sync.
The accompanist who never played a false note,
who played with such stunning precision...
As if I am at the bottom of a dark sea, I cannot hear anything.
I am at the bottom of a dark sea...

Too bad, I did like the violin.

I am pounding the keys so hard...
Why is it that the only thing I cannot hear is my own playing?
but if he keeps on playing, it could affect the violinist.

I will only make trouble for you.

Does this mean they are disqualified?
